data.actual_result: You're able to still see messages that were/are being sent after you left
data.expected_result: No "live" chat. It should display the same messages as it was when you lost access to the chat.
data.short_description: You are able to see chat(s) that update when only certain roles/people have access to them and you don't.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone @ mention you in that chat - Have a friend remove that role so that you lose access to that chat - Make that friend start typing/saying stuff while you check your mentions tab - Click the @ mention from that chat and scroll to the bottom
